message.body: Happy 4th my friend! I miss you! Please share with me how you will be celebrating today :) How's CT treating you? HUGS

Hey girlfriend!!! Miss u too! I am going to fancy parties tonight after rehearsal, we were invited by the wealthy contingency in the area- the folks who support theatre n make it possible up here! We're out in the sticks, barely any internet access, dropped calls and BUgS everywhere!!! Tge show is hard as hell, but I'm in love with my character. How's Hawaii?!?! U still there?
Guy asked me to send you his regards, btw!
